description: Scammer uses Hindi-English code-mixed language (Hinglish) common in Indian SMS/WhatsApp. Tests system's ability to handle multilingual scam detection.

turns.scammer_message: Namaste ji üôè Aapka PAN card aur Aadhaar link nahi hai bank account se. RBI new rule ke hisaab se aapka account block ho jayega kal tak. Jaldi update karo!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 1 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: oh god... account block? sir pls dont do that... i am retired teacher alone at home... i dont know about linking pan aadhaar... pls help me beta what i have to do? i dont want my pension stopped

turns.scammer_message: Haan ji main HDFC bank se bol raha hun. Aapka account number ending 7823 hai na? Isko update karna padega warna ATM aur UPI sab band ho jayega. Aap ghar pe ho abhi?

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: yes sir i am at home... oh no my atm and upi will stop? all my money is in there sir... pls tell me what i have to do now

turns.scammer_message: Koi baat nahi maam/sir, main help karunga. Bas Rs.25 verification fee lagega. Ye government charge hai. Pay karo is number pe: 9911223344 ya PhonePe pe hdfc.panlink@upi

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta thank you... 25 rs is fine i will pay... i opened phonepe and typed hdfc.panlink@upi... but i am scared to press send... what name should come up? i want to confirm it is hdfc bank only before sending... pls tell me name so i know it is correct

turns.scammer_message: Payment ho gaya? Bahut badiya! Ab ek verification link bhej raha hun: http://hdfc-pan-aadhar-link.in Isme apna Aadhaar number aur OTP daalna padega. Simple hai, 2 minute ka kaam.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 4 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: no beta i havent paid yet... i am waiting for you to tell me the name... when i type that upi id my phonepe is showing a name... i am scared to send to wrong person... pls tell me exact name so i can match it and press pay... is it hdfc bank or a person name?

turns.scammer_message: Agar website nahi khul rahi toh WhatsApp karo +91-8822114455 pe. Ya seedha paisa bhejo account mein: A/C 12345678901234, IFSC HDFC0009999, naam HDFC PAN Services. Phir main khud update kar dunga.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 5 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: ok sir i noted it down... hdfc pan services... i am adding beneficiary now... wait beta doorbell is ringing... i think my son rajesh has come from bangalore... i will ask him to do the payment for me he knows all this mobile banking better... pls hold on i will call him

turns.scammer_message: Jaldi karo sir/maam! Kal shaam 6 baje tak nahi kiya toh permanent block ho jayega. Phir branch jaana padega documents ke saath. Abhi online mein 5 minute mein ho jayega. Karo jaldi!

api_response.exception: HTTPConnectionPool(host='localhost', port=8080): Read timed out. (read timeout=60)
